definition: erhua variant of 應名|应名[ying1 ming2]
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
surname Ying
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
child/son
non-syllabic diminutive suffix/retroflex final
not be accustomed to eating sth/not be used to certain food
to sow discord everywhere
see 黃花閨女|黄花闺女[huang2 hua1 gui1 nu:3]
scoundrel with an honest demeanor/see also 蔫兒壞|蔫儿坏[nian1 r5 huai4]
impudent
to belittle/to attack sb
immensely rich
variant of 觸霉頭|触霉头[chu4 mei2 tou2]
vulgar/foul-mouthed
to tell/to inform
hothead/rash individual
see 項莊舞劍，意在沛公|项庄舞剑，意在沛公[Xiang4 Zhuang1 wu3 jian4 , yi4 zai4 Pei4 gong1]
pinyin: Xiang4 Zhuang1 wu3 jian4 , zhi4 zai4 Pei4 gong1

definition: dull-witted and tongue-tied
lit. the dog that bites doesn't show its teeth (idiom)/fig. the most sinister of people can look quite harmless

definition: helpless lonely person
